issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I discovered that if I have selinux set to enforcing, the storage controller never becomes enabled.  I see this error in the cloud-output.log:
{code}
2016-11-28 22:57:14 ERROR 000001680 SystemUtil               | com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException: lvm: Permission denied
com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException: lvm: Permission denied

        at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.util.SystemUtil.run(SystemUtil.java:223)
        at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.util.SystemUtil.run(SystemUtil.java:193)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.LVMWrapper.getLvmVersion(LVMWrapper.java:81)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.DASManager.checkPreconditions(DASManager.java:140)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.StorageManagers$2.load(StorageManagers.java:148)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.StorageManagers$2.load(StorageManagers.java:143)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$LoadingValueReference.loadFuture(LocalCache.java:3527)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$Segment.loadSync(LocalCache.java:2319)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$Segment.lockedGetOrLoad(LocalCache.java:2282)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$Segment.get(LocalCache.java:2197)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache.get(LocalCache.java:3937)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache.getOrLoad(LocalCache.java:3941)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$LocalLoadingCache.get(LocalCache.java:4824)
        at com.google.common.cache.LocalCache$LocalLoadingCache.getUnchecked(LocalCache.java:4830)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.StorageManagers.getInstance(StorageManagers.java:163)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.StorageManagers.getInstance(StorageManagers.java:172)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.config.StorageControllerBuilder.fireLoad(StorageControllerBuilder.java:122)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$ServiceLocalTransitionCallbacks$1.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:598)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.processTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:360)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.access$000(ServiceTransitions.java:123)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:412)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:379)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:218)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:524)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:342)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:185)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:136)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:83)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:141)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:126)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3$1.run(Futures.java:215)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
2016-11-28 22:57:14 ERROR 000001680 DASManager               | Unable to run command: Is lvm installed?
2016-11-28 22:57:14 ERROR 000000068 Topology                 | START:DISABLED  arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:storage:one-sc-1/ BROKEN->DISABLED=BROKEN [Unable to run command: Is lvm installed?]
{code}
If I set selinux back to permissive then the SC service loads as expected.  This happened after attempting an upgrade from 4.2.2->4.3.1 on rhel6u7 to 4.3.1 on rhel7u3.  I also had to start the tgtd service manually on the CLC.  The instructions here say I shouldn't have to:  https://docs.eucalyptus.com/eucalyptus/latest/#install-guide/starting_euca_sc.html
fields.summary: Storage controller does not become enabled if selinux set to enforcing

comments.body:
audit log output:
{code}
time->Tue Nov 29 10:25:35 2016
type=SYSCALL msg=audit(1480443935.596:1176): arch=c000003e syscall=42 success=no exit=-13 a0=3 a1=7ffc90d58150 a2=6e a3=7ffc90d57ed0 items=0 ppid=11907 pid=32307 auid=4294967295 uid=0 gid=0 euid=0 suid=0 fsuid=0 egid=0 sgid=0 fsgid=0 tty=(none) ses=4294967295 comm="tgtadm" exe="/usr/sbin/tgtadm" subj=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_cloud_t:s0 key=(null)
type=AVC msg=audit(1480443935.596:1176): avc:  denied  { connectto } for  pid=32307 comm="tgtadm" path="/run/tgtd.ipc_abstract_namespace.0" scontext=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_cloud_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 tclass=unix_stream_socket
----
time->Tue Nov 29 10:25:34 2016
type=SYSCALL msg=audit(1480443934.937:1173): arch=c000003e syscall=42 success=no exit=-13 a0=3 a1=7ffcfd0a6ae0 a2=6e a3=7ffcfd0a6860 items=0 ppid=11907 pid=32293 auid=4294967295 uid=0 gid=0 euid=0 suid=0 fsuid=0 egid=0 sgid=0 fsgid=0 tty=(none) ses=4294967295 comm="tgtadm" exe="/usr/sbin/tgtadm" subj=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_cloud_t:s0 key=(null)
type=AVC msg=audit(1480443934.937:1173): avc:  denied  { connectto } for  pid=32293 comm="tgtadm" path="/run/tgtd.ipc_abstract_namespace.0" scontext=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_cloud_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 tclass=unix_stream_socket
{code}
{code}
type=AVC msg=audit(1480444014.370:1189): avc:  denied  { connectto } for  pid=32542 comm="tgtadm" path="/run/tgtd.ipc_abstract_namespace.0" scontext=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_clout:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 tclass=unix_stream_socket

        Was caused by:
        One of the following booleans was set incorrectly.
        Description:
        Allow eucalyptus to storage controller

        Allow access by executing:
        # setsebool -P eucalyptus_storage_controller 1
        Description:
        Allow daemons to enable cluster mode

        Allow access by executing:
        # setsebool -P daemons_enable_cluster_mode 1
{code}
Closing as not a bug since it is documented and i was able to get it working.
